greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(n) = A140263(n-1)+1.
link: Indranil Ghosh, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..6561
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: def a004488(n): return int("".join([str((3 - i)%3) for i in digits(n, 3)[1:]]), 3)
def a117967(n): return 0 if n==0 else a117968(-n) if n<0 else a004488(a117968(n))
def a(n): return a117967(a001057(n - 1)) + 1 # _Indranil Ghosh_, Jun 07 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 19 2008
